job_tasks.phrase: Work with product owners and curators to understand requirements and guide new features
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly indicates the need to comprehend business needs and translate them into technical guidance for new features.

job_tasks.phrase: Create appropriate data pipelines for AI / ML
job_tasks.justification: This explicitly states the task of building and managing data infrastructure for AI/ML.

job_tasks.phrase: Analyze, curate, cleanse, and split data
job_tasks.justification: These actions are core components of data preprocessing and feature engineering, which fall under data engineering.

job_tasks.phrase: Hands-on AI / ML software engineer that will apply AI to solutions in the learning space
job_tasks.justification: Indicates the direct application and implementation of AI/ML models.

job_tasks.phrase: Prompt engineering and associated reliab
job_tasks.justification: Prompt engineering is a key technique for interacting with and optimizing generative models.

job_tasks.phrase: Utilize and apply generative AI within new products / features and for daily productivity
job_tasks.justification: This highlights the use and implementation of generative AI technologies.

job_tasks.phrase: Periodically explore new technologies and design patterns with proof-of-concept
job_tasks.justification: Proof-of-concept work often involves experimenting with and evaluating new modeling approaches.

job_tasks.phrase: Vector indexing / database (RAG)
job_tasks.justification: RAG systems are a specific type of generative AI modeling, and vector indexing is a core component.

job_tasks.phrase: Agentic Frameworks (LangChain, AutoGen, etc.)
job_tasks.justification: These frameworks are used to build complex AI agents, which involves advanced modeling techniques.

job_tasks.phrase: Collaborate with team to design, develop, and maintain application systems utilizing AI
job_tasks.justification: This describes the core software development lifecycle for AI-powered applications.

job_tasks.phrase: Document designs and implementation to ensure consistency and alignment with standards
job_tasks.justification: Documentation of designs and implementations is a standard software development practice.

job_tasks.phrase: Create documentation including system, APIs, data structures, and sequence diagrams
job_tasks.justification: This details the creation of technical documentation for software systems and their components.

job_tasks.phrase: APIs GraphQL, REST
job_tasks.justification: API development is a fundamental aspect of software development for integration.

job_tasks.phrase: SQL (Postgres RDS / Aurora), NoSQL (Cassandra, Elasticsearch)
job_tasks.justification: Working with databases is a key part of building and maintaining software systems.

job_tasks.phrase: Docker, Kubernetes
job_tasks.justification: These are common tools used for containerization and orchestration, essential for MLOps.

job_tasks.phrase: Amazon Web Services (AWS), MS Azure OpenAI
job_tasks.justification: Cloud platforms are integral to deploying and managing AI/ML systems in production.

job_tasks.phrase: Messaging - Kafka, RabbitMQ, SQS
job_tasks.justification: Messaging queues are used for building resilient and scalable systems, often part of MLOps pipelines.

job_tasks.phrase: Monitoring - Prometheus, ELK
job_tasks.justification: Monitoring tools are crucial for maintaining and operating ML/GenAI systems in production.

job_tasks.phrase: Participate in developing best practices and improving operational processes
job_tasks.justification: This directly relates to the continuous improvement of operational aspects of AI systems.

classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes the use and application of generative AI, including advanced prompt engineering and leveraging LLMs with frameworks like LangChain. It also highlights building and maintaining production-grade software systems that utilize AI, aligning perfectly with the definition of a GenAI Engineer.
